entry.title: Trook rev:45
entry.content: Revision 45 is another bug-fix revision, and reorganizes the root menu a little bit. All the book folders are now grouped into a submenu--let me know if you feel strongly about doing this. The easter egg for this revision is Wikipedia search. Get into the Wikipedia menu, and don't miss the search icon on the top.
